m_szDocTitle: Illinois AG wants a plan for Chicago natural gas pipelines | Midwest Energy News
m_szDocSumamry: Illinois AG wants a plan for Chicago natural gas pipelines Don't miss the latest headlines. Sign up for our Daily Digests. Midwest Headlines National Headlines PIPELINES: Geologists are concerned proposed natural gas pipelines in Ohio may be vulnerable to sinkholes . (Midwest Energy News) ALSO: • Illinois' attorney general pushes Wisconsin Energy to come up with a plan to deal with a troubled program to replace natural gas lines in Chicago, a situation it will inherit in its proposed acquisition of Integrys Energy. (Crain's Chicago Business) • Minnesota tribes are holding their own public hear
